aboute-me.title: Who I Am
aboute-me.subtitle: About me
aboute-me.intro: As a frontend developer based in Viernheim, I am passionate about the diversity within IT. With great enthusiasm, I design modern and user-friendly websites and applications that stand out with their clean aesthetics and intuitive usability.
aboute-me.first: I am flexible when it comes to the workplace and deliver top performance both in the direct vicinity of Viernheim, Mannheim, Heidelberg, as well as remotely.
aboute-me.second: I am open to new challenges and always looking for opportunities to continuously improve my knowledge and skills.
aboute-me.third: For me, programming is much more than just writing code – it's a creative way to solve problems. I place great importance on translating complex technical challenges into clear and user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your ideas to life.

skills.intro: On my journey so far, I have worked on a variety of projects and utilized a wide range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am always open to new ideas and enjoy acquiring new methods and technologies to continuously improve my skills and stay up to date in the ever-evolving world of web development.
skills.text: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

feedback.title: What my colleagues say about me
feedback.l_pan: Working with Samuel was fantastic! His ability to solve complex frontend issues significantly advanced our project. Always creative and reliable!
feedback.g_heinrich: Samuel not only brings technical knowledge, but also has an excellent sense of user experience. His designs are appealing and intuitive, which greatly benefits our users.
feedback.e_herniks: It's always a pleasure to work with Samuel. He is not only talented in programming but also a team player, always willing to share his knowledge and support others.
